results.title: Inception
results.overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

results.title: The Dark Knight
results.overview: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

results.title: Pulp Fiction
results.overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

results.title: The Shawshank Redemption
results.overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

results.title: The Godfather
results.overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

results.title: Fight Club
results.overview: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

results.title: The Matrix
results.overview: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

results.title: Goodfellas
results.overview: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

results.title: Interstellar
results.overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

results.title: The Silence of the Lambs
results.overview: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

results.title: Blade Runner 2049
results.overview: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

results.title: The Avengers
results.overview: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

results.title: Parasite
results.overview: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

results.title: Joker
results.overview: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

results.title: Avatar
results.overview: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

results.title: Titanic
results.overview: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

results.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
results.overview: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

results.title: The Incredibles
results.overview: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

results.title: Spirited Away
results.overview: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

results.title: The Lion King
results.overview: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

results.title: The Social Network
results.overview: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

results.title: Whiplash
results.overview: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

results.title: Get Out
results.overview: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

results.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
results.overview: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

results.title: Forrest Gump
results.overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

results.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
results.overview: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

results.title: Dune
results.overview: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel, about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

results.title: No Time to Die
results.overview: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

results.title: The Green Mile
results.overview: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

results.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
results.overview: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.
